description: Manual data fixes that must persist across re-fetches and re-exports. DO NOT DELETE entries without understanding why they were added.

price_overrides._comment: Override specific price candles. Applied during export, NOT stored in DB.

entries.reason: Fake wick from MEV bot/sniper. Original HIGH was ~0.02, 2.5x the close price. Note: DB was also manually fixed, so this is a safety net for re-fetches.
entries.added_by: manual fix after chart showed spike

tweet_exclusions._comment: Exclude specific tweets by ID. These tweets exist in DB but won't be exported.

price_exclusions._comment: Exclude entire candles from export. Use for bad data that can't be fixed.

asset_data_ranges._comment: Override the effective data range for an asset (beyond launch_date filter).

notes: This file is the SOURCE OF TRUTH for all manual data fixes.
Fixes are applied at EXPORT time, not in the database.
The database contains raw data; this file contains corrections.
Before deleting ANY entry, understand WHY it was added.
Run 'python export_static.py' after modifying this file.
